item.title: An Introduction To Web Scraping
item.description: I recently started seeing a lot of posts related to illegal web scarping by AI companies, all thanks to frequency illusion. In this blog, we’ll discuss the basics of web scraping and let’s learn how to scrape things from the web. Legality Before jumping straight into the weeds, let’s address the elephant in the room: “Is it legal to scrape the web?”. Well, it depends on who we ask this question.
